welcome_message_body: Welcome to Suwon, Korea, South! Get ready to immerse yourself in the city's rich history, stunning architecture, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Suwon has to offer.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'GMP-Free-WiFi' and completing a short registration process.
